author: China Uncensored
description:
A massive chemical explosion has rocked eastern China, killing at least five and injuring many more at a chemical factory. It comes after the site was praised by the CCP for its "safety management"—which clearly aged well. In this episode, we dive into the deadly consequences of China's corruption, explore how the CCP may be linked to anti-Israel activist networks, and look at why Trump wants to kick Chinese students out of the US.

title: Toxic Chemical Explosion Rocks China
